Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Amunrekh with painted detail: a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black features, a black striated collar, parallel hands in relief and outlined in black holding two black hoes, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black Hieroglyphs within a panel, the back is decorated with a black seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots.
